item.description: [design.background] # Background image. image = “backgroundArtboard.png” # Name of image in static/img/. image_darken = 0.6 # Darken the image? Range 0-1 where 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque. I am a Herchel Smith Postdoctoral Research Fellow at the University of Cambridge. In short, my main interests lie in biomechanics. I use a mixture of mathematical modelling and computational simulations to derive a physical understanding of biological systems. A fundamental aspect of this work is extensive interaction between “wet” and “dry” biologists.
